title: New requirement for apps on the App Store in the European Union
description: As of today, apps without trader status have been removed from the App Store in the European Union (EU) until trader status is provided and verified by Apple.Account Holders or Admins in the Apple Developer Program will need to enter this status in App Store Connect to comply with the Digital Services Act.Learn what a trader is and how to enter your status

text: New requirement for apps on the App Store in the European Union February 18, 2025 As of today, apps without trader status have been removed from the App Store in the European Union (EU) until trader status is provided and verified by Apple.Account Holders or Admins in the Apple Developer Program will need to enter this status in App Store Connect to comply with the Digital Services Act.Learn what a trader is and how to enter your status
html:
New requirement for apps on the App Store in the European Union

February 18, 2025

As of today, apps without trader status have been removed from the App Store in the European Union (EU) until trader status is provided and verified by Apple.

Account Holders or Admins in the Apple Developer Program will need to enter this status in App Store Connect to comply with the Digital Services Act.

Learn what a trader is and how to enter your status
